author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...IMELDA MOVING NORTHWARD WITH TROPICAL STORM CONDITIONS ONGOING FOR THE CENTRAL AND NORTHWESTERN BAHAMAS...
summary: ...IMELDA MOVING NORTHWARD WITH TROPICAL STORM CONDITIONS ONGOING FOR THE CENTRAL AND NORTHWESTERN BAHAMAS... As of 5:00 PM EDT Sun Sep 28 the center of Imelda was located near 24.2, -77.3 with movement N at 9 mph. The minimum central pressure was 998 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 40 mph.

summary_detail.value: ...IMELDA MOVING NORTHWARD WITH TROPICAL STORM CONDITIONS ONGOING FOR THE CENTRAL AND NORTHWESTERN BAHAMAS... As of 5:00 PM EDT Sun Sep 28 the center of Imelda was located near 24.2, -77.3 with movement N at 9 mph. The minimum central pressure was 998 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 40 mph.

title: Summary - Tropical Storm Imelda (AT4/AL092025)
